forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. WNW winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. WNW winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low near 5C. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 39F. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 52F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
